column1: Kata Robata////I've been here several times
column2: and will say this is one of my solid goto places for nice sushi in Houston! The restaurant is pretty big
column4: and an outdoor patio. Kata will have something just for about everyone. I am a big fan of traditional nigiri and maki
column5: while my friends are into the octopus crudo
column8: and green tea souffle cheesecake. Fish was all very fresh and service was solid. Total cost for appetizer
column11: and dessert was about $55 per person. Which is a really solid price point for what you are getting in the fish
